name: Kitten Sanctuary Lite
description:
Rescue kittens from strange alien traps and keep them safe & happy!

Your kittens will love the food, drink and warmth you provide for them, but if supplies are running low you can always use kitten toys to give their spirits a boost.

There are no IAPs, all items, decorations & toys are 'bought' using the coins you'll find in the game!

Features:
- 10 cute kittens, each with their own story.
- 15 levels with three game mode variations.
- Five fun toys to help keep your kittens happy.
- Collect gems and coins to buy gifts and decorations.
- Customize your own unique sanctuary location.
- Separate levels for iPhone & iPad to suit both screens.
- Player profiles so a family can share the game.
- Share your progress across devices via iCloud.
- Full Retina support, including 4" displays.

If you enjoy Kitten Sanctuary Lite, please consider purchasing the full version, Kitten Sanctuary! There are another 40 kittens waiting to be rescued, 100 levels in total and loads of new decorations and toys to keep all your kittens happy!

Puppy Sanctuary is also available on the App Store. Rescue loads of adorable puppies from those pesky aliens! Try out Puppy Sanctuary for free today!
